p: The effects of MO on meat quality and viscera percentages of broilers are shown in Table 4. Broilers fed MO2 had higher (p<0.01) liver percentage, while broilers fed MO showed greater (p<0.01) redness in thigh muscle compared to CTR. Broilers fed MO1 had a tendency for a decrease of yellowness in breast and thigh muscle, while drip loss in breast and thigh muscle was decreased (pâ‰¤0.05) in broilers fed MO compared to CTR.
